      • resolve

        @Nonnull
public DoiData resolve(DOI doi)
                         throws DoiException
        Resolves the registered identifier to its status and target URL.
        Specified by:
        resolve in interface DoiService
        Parameters:
        doi - the identifier to resolve
        Returns:
        the status object with the target URL the DOI is backed by or null if DOI does not exist at all
        Throws:
        DoiException - if the operation failed for any reason
